_CorePolygonMethods¶

Doc:

short class_name: _CorePolygonMethods

full class_name : oceantracker.particle_statistics.polygon_statistics._CorePolygonMethods

Warning

Class is under development may not yet work in all cases, if errors contact developer

Inheritance: > ParameterBaseClass> _CorePolygonMethods

Parameters:¶

  • class_name<class 'str'> <optional>

    Description: Class name as string A.B.C, used to import this class from python path

    • default: None

    • data_type: <class 'str'>

  • name<class 'str'> <optional>

    Description: Name used to refer to class in code and output, = None for core claseses

    • default: None

    • data_type: <class 'str'>

  • use_release_group_polygons<class 'bool'> <optional>

    Description: Omit polygon_list param and use all polygon release polygons as statistics/counting polygons, useful for building release group polygon to polygon connectivity matrix.

    • default: False

    • data_type: <class 'bool'>

    • possible_values: [True, False]

  • user_note<class 'str'> <optional>

    • default: None

    • data_type: <class 'str'>
